name: cra-with-cloudflare-router
description: A template of a create react app (Inculdes: sass, react-router, and context store) and a cloudflare worker.

scripts.deploy: cd ./client; yarn build; cd ..; wrangler publish
scripts.deploy:production: cd ./client; yarn build; cd ..; wrangler publish --env production

author: Keith Rose <andrerose722@gmail.com>
